title: Revolutionary agricultural invention to optimize farming techniques

tasks.task: Driving a loader tractor with bucket
subtasks: Sitting in loader tractor seat
Operating loader joystick to lift and lower bucket
Using steering wheel to navigate tractor
Engaging four wheel drive
Engaging high gear
Maneuvering tractor around fields
Stopping tractor safely

tasks.task: Moving loose soil using loader bucket
subtasks: Placing bucket into loose soil heap
Scooping soil into bucket with loader
Raising bucket to transfer soil to desired location
Lowering bucket to deposit soil
Repeating process to move large amounts of soil

tasks.task: Aligning tracks for balanced movement
subtasks: Observing ground condition to ensure even traction
Adjusting track pressure if necessary
Checking for rocks or debris that could unbalance tracks
Ensuring tracks are properly tensioned

tasks.task: Positioning the bucket for soil movement
subtasks: Observing the area to determine where soil needs to be moved
Controlling loader bucket direction for precise placement
Using backhoe attachment on loader for more precise digging

tasks.task: Loading soil onto truck or another vehicle
subtasks: Aligning bucket with the truck bed
Lowering bucket to load soil
Raising bucket to unload soil into truck
Repeating process multiple times for full load

tasks.task: Securing the vehicle after loading
subtasks: Checking rear view mirrors for any adjustments
Checking blind spots before moving vehicle
Turning off engine and disengaging rig

tasks.task: Driving a pickup truck
subtasks: Seating operator in pickup truck
Driving in the field to designated area
Stopping at appropriate locations as needed
Turning on the truck engine when required

tasks.task: Unloading soil from pickup truck
subtasks: Backing truck into position near the field
Opening truck bed to access soil
Using a shovel or other tool to scoop soil from truck
Carrying soil to the field manually or using a wheelbarrow
Distributing soil in the field as needed

tasks.task: Manual shoveling of soil
subtasks: Approaching the pile of soil with shovel
Scooping soil into shovel
Walking to field location drop point
Releasing soil from shovel into designated area
Repeating process for each shovel load

tasks.task: Proper storage of tools and equipment
subtasks: Cleaning shovel after use
Stowing shovel in designated storage area on the pickup truck

tasks.task: Ensuring safety around high traffic areas
subtasks: Keeping open areas clear of loose equipment
Walking around equipment to check for trip hazards
Warn operators of vehicles to avoid collisions

tasks.task: Re-engaging the loader after unloading
subtasks: Checking for any adjustments needed on the loader
Turning on the loader engine if previously turned off
